elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Share your assumptions about the following questions with the class:

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Why does Bela Bonzo keep claiming to be a friend of the government?
elements.correctAnswer: Because he was instructed to do so and because he is probably afraid.

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: Why does he secretly give the journalist a broken tooth?
elements.correctAnswer: To prove to him that he was forced to make his statements by force (knocked out tooth and swollen upper lip).

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: What form of government could prevail in his country?
